trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_000<tab>We've had no word from the guildmaster since he left for Kugane. I do hope he hasn't gotten lost...or worse.

TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_010<tab>I have everything under control here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It sounds like Martyn's the one who really needs your help right now.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_020<tab>I don't care how good this Gogo thinks he is, no paltry imitator stands a chance against you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_040<tab>Still no word from Martyn, but never fear─it shouldn't be long before he's found a prospective rival for you.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_050<tab>I can only imagine what Martyn is up to in Limsa, but you'll look after him, won't you?

TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_060<tab>The Arcanists' Guild? He wasn't offering more of his private lessons again, was he? Given the opportunity to flaunt his knowledge, the man simply can't help himself.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_070<tab>Martyn said he has a good feeling about Gridania. I certainly hope he's right.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_080<tab>I heard Martyn was actually after a bounty, is that right? Somehow I'm not surprised.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_090<tab>He wasn't ruffling any feathers at the stables, was he? Surely not...
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_100<tab>To be honest, it's hard to picture Martyn as a villain, even if he's only acting.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_110<tab>By the sounds of it, Royse has afforded Martyn more than an unfair advantage, so don't worry about holding back.
TEXT_CTSETCAOZPYANDIHTALK_00847_PYANDIH_000_120<tab>You were absolutely brilliant, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I can scarcely remember the last time the Celestium was so lively.
